title: Try using ✨Effects✨ plus learn about Shorts Monetization Updates #ShortsRoundUp

media:group.media:title: Try using ✨Effects✨ plus learn about Shorts Monetization Updates #ShortsRoundUp
media:group.media:description:
Learn more about monetization updates coming to YouTube in 2023! First, we're rolling out Ad Revenue sharing for Shorts for creators in YPP. And we’re announcing a new way for Shorts creators to join YPP. Plus, try out Effects!

For more info, check out these resources:
https://blog.youtube/news-and-events/supporting-the-next-wave-of-creative-entrepreneurs
https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/12475004
https://support.google.com/youtube/thread/175575648
